titleStmt.title: A Poem upon Mr. Tytus Oates the first discoverer of the late popish plot.
titleStmt.author: White, Robert, 1645-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Hen. Brome and Ric. Chiswell ...,

notesStmt.note: Includes engraved portrait of Oates by Robert White.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
